charges.charge_description: 18 USC 7 &; 13; 18 USC 3118 Count 1 REFUSAL TO TEST 1yr revoc on Federal Property; ORC 4511.19(a) (1) Count 2 DUI 3days-6months/$200-$1000/SA $10/6months-3yrs license revoc; Count 3: EXPIRED LICENSE 6mos/$1000/SA $10 ORC 4507.02(a)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant Danny L Davis sentenced to a fine of $200.00 a a Special Assement of $10.00, shall pay fine at the rate of 20 per month S/A due immediately, shall; obtain and maintain employment, undergo substance abuse treatment,random urinalysis ordered to obtain a drivers license Probation for 1yr (-1)
